rules.title: Recipes are first-class
rules.description: A ‚Äòrecipe‚Äô (stages + setpoints + schedules + safety limits) must be versioned and tied to logs. Repeatability is the product.

rules.title: Bias to robust control over clever control
rules.description: Start with rules + hysteresis and clear stage schedules. Only add PID/ML if it materially improves outcomes.

rules.title: Design for cleanability
rules.description: Surfaces, water paths, and humidification must be easy to clean. Minimise standing water and hidden damp cavities.

rules.title: Contamination is a primary failure mode for mushrooms
rules.description: Assume users will introduce contaminants. Provide workflows and hardware choices that reduce risk (filters, guidance, easy wipe-down).

rules.title: Local-first operation
rules.description: Core growing must work without internet (home resilience + privacy). Cloud features can be additive later (sharing recipes, support).

rules.title: Explainable automation
rules.description: When the system acts, it should be able to say why (setpoint, stage, and recent sensor context).
